title: Janma Janmada Anubandha
text:
Janma Janmada Anubandha is a 1980 Indian <a href="Kannada">Kannada</a>-language <a href="thriller%20drama">thriller drama</a> film directed, co-produced and scripted by <a href="Shankar%20Nag">Shankar Nag</a>. The film has an <a href="ensemble%20cast">ensemble cast</a> including <a href="Anant%20Nag">Anant Nag</a>, <a href="Shankar%20Nag">Shankar Nag</a>, <a href="Jayanthi%20%28actress%29">Jayanthi</a>, <a href="Jayamala">Jayamala</a> and <a href="Manjula%20%28Kannada%20actress%29">Manjula</a>.
The film was a musical blockbuster with all the songs composed by <a href="Ilaiyaraaja">Ilaiyaraaja</a> considered evergreen hits. Janma Janmada Anubandha was one of the highest grossing Kannada films of the year 1980. It was declared a superhit at the box office. It's considered one of the best movies by Anant Nag and Shankar Nag duo.
Soundtrack.
The music of the film was composed by <a href="Ilaiyaraaja">Ilaiyaraaja</a>, with lyrics by <a href="Chi.%20Udaya%20Shankar">Chi. Udaya Shankar</a>. The songs "Thangaliyaali Naanu" is composed in Keeravani raaga, "Yaava Shilpi" is composed in Gambheera Nattai raaga, and "Akashadinda Jaari" is composed in Mohana raaga. All songs composed for the film were received extremely well and considered evergreen hits.
Background score is ultimate in this movie as for each scene mastero ilayaraja composed very different BGM . Especially chorus while flashback scene of past life, capella style used by him in other scenes is just amazing. It is one of the greatest master piece by Ilayaraja .
